title: Railworks TS2014 Amtrak HHP-8 Loco
description:
The HHP-8 for Train Simulator is available in Amtraks renowned blue and silver livery, and features cruise control, in-cab signalling display with driver vigilance, switchable display screens, cab lights, flashing ditch lights and pantograph select. Also included are Amfleet I passenger cars. 

The locomotive is also Quick Drive compatible, giving you the freedom to drive the Amtrak HHP-8 on any Quick Drive enabled route for Train Simulator. Also included are scenarios specifically for the NEC New York-New Haven route (available separately and required to play these scenarios).




Please support the developers and buy some of their content if you can afford it.


Please use the email address or the facebook fanpage for requests, questions and also if you want to share an addon with the community which we will post on your behalf.

If you would like to contribute, please read the Readme.pdf.




A Team tpb_4_ever upload.
